analyzed: ▁sa nidassan a sappaṭigh o ▁na sa nidassan o ▁dhammo ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh assa ▁nasanidassanas sa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi,
Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
